texts: Sparkamek is being updated to the latest version.
Sparkamek allows you to manage your Kamek projects more easily.
Don't forget that this app is experimental and that it may contain bugs. Remember to often make backups of your projects, manually or using Git.
You already have an advanced project ? No problem, Sparkamek can import it.
Sparkamek is not meant to fix bugs in the game, but to add new features. However, you can always use the build-in debugger to help you find bugs.
You can choose how often Sparkamek checks for updates in the settings.

downloadFailed.title: Download Failed
downloadFailed.text: An error occurred while downloading the update.

installFailed.title: Install Failed
installFailed.text: An error occurred while installing the update.

openAppFailed.title: Open App Failed
openAppFailed.text: An error occurred while opening the app.
